value.title: StarCraft 2: LATE GAME INSANITY! (Dark vs Creator)
value.excerpt: Excellent game of professional Zerg versus Protoss in StarCraft 2. In this game between Dark and Creator we dive into the late game of this matchup and take a glimpse at certain unexplored strategies.   OlimoLeague on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/olimoley   Become a YouTube member: https://lowko.tv/join

value.excerpt: The Terran versus Zerg match up in StarCraft 2 seems to be Terran favoured in the late game. In this match of Dark versus ByuN, Dark (Zerg) decides to try out a Mass Brood Lord micro trick versus ByuN (Terran).
